**Small Engine Repair Standing Offer Request**
==============================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
------------------------------

### Reference Information

*   **Contract Title**: Small Engine Repair Standing Offer Request
*   **Contract Number**: cb-312-30602287
*   **Solicitation Number**: NRCan - 5000081981
*   **Expiration Date**: 2024-07-15

### Tender Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   **Expected Contract Duration**: July 22, 2024 - July 31, 2025 with optional extensions up to 4 years

### Solicitation Requirement

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites contractors to submit a standing offer for small engine and other miscellaneous equipment repairs in the National Capital Region (NCR).

*   The contract includes services to be provided to the Polar Continental Shelf Program (PCSP).
*   A maximum of three standing offers will be awarded as a result of this request.

### Key Information

*   **Contact Person**: Julia Pace [julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca +1-902-719-4856](mailto:julia.pace@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
*   **Address**: 1 Challenger Drive, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Canada, B2Y 4A2
*   **Attachments**: RFP Amendment 2, RFP Amendment 1, RFP Package English and French Versions

You can find the RFP package at https:// canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39708/nrcan-5000081981-english.pdf or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39708/nrcan-5000081981-francais.pdf.  Further information can be obtained from Julia Pace, who is also  the primary point of contact for this notice.
